entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Occasional drifting snow. Wind east 30 km/h except 50 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. 70 percent chance of light snow over southern sections in the morning. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 29 April 2023
